name: NPCorp
description:
what's more stuck in a loop than an npc?

Every NPC are stuck in their own loop. What if there was a corporation behind all of them ? wich provides jobs to stick and stuck them into loops where they’ll stay… until the end of their life.

Phasman - Vincent Breheret - Programer
Antoine TEIL               - Programer
Boudouss - Antoine Boudet  - Art
Flibusted - marion zudas   - Voice + Art
MOTOM - Tom Boyer          - Voice + Cinematic animation + Sound design
Masami Komuro              - Music
